taskComplexityData.title: Project Setup and Infrastructure
taskComplexityData.explanation: Moderate complexity due to the need to set up multiple technologies (Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Vercel, GitHub Actions). Requires careful configuration of build processes and deployment pipelines.

taskComplexityData.title: Authentication System
taskComplexityData.explanation: High complexity due to multiple auth providers (email, Google, Apple), secure token rotation requirements, and integration with Firebase Auth and Firebase Rules for row-level security.

taskComplexityData.title: User Profiles
taskComplexityData.explanation: Significant complexity due to profile customization options (avatar, banner, bio, unique handles), image upload requirements, and public vs. private profile views.

taskComplexityData.title: Video Posting System
taskComplexityData.explanation: Very high complexity due to integration with multiple external platforms (YouTube, Vimeo, Twitch), metadata fetching, and edit/delete functionality. Core to the application's purpose.

taskComplexityData.title: Feed Implementation
taskComplexityData.explanation: High complexity due to multiple feed types, potential performance challenges with large content volumes, and pagination requirements.

taskComplexityData.title: Social Interactions
taskComplexityData.explanation: Moderately high complexity due to real-time interaction requirements, @mention functionality in comments, and follow/unfollow relationship management.

taskComplexityData.title: Stations Feature
taskComplexityData.explanation: High complexity due to autoplay functionality, cross-platform video player integration, and mobile/desktop controls. May involve complex state management.

taskComplexityData.title: User Discovery System
taskComplexityData.explanation: High complexity due to algorithmic user suggestion requirements, onboarding integration, and discover carousel implementation.

taskComplexityData.title: Squads (Private Groups)
taskComplexityData.explanation: Very high complexity due to private content management, invitation system with expiring links, permissions system, and group-specific feeds.

taskComplexityData.title: Cross-Platform Sharing
taskComplexityData.explanation: Moderate complexity due to integration with multiple external platforms and OG metadata requirements for previews.

taskComplexityData.title: In-Platform Search
taskComplexityData.explanation: Moderate complexity due to integration with external platform search APIs and autocomplete implementation.

taskComplexityData.title: Notifications System V2
taskComplexityData.explanation: High complexity due to in-app notifications, email digest batching, and granular user preferences.

taskComplexityData.title: Badge System
taskComplexityData.explanation: Moderate complexity due to milestone verification logic and badge display requirements.

taskComplexityData.title: Moderation Tools
taskComplexityData.explanation: Moderate complexity due to admin interface requirements, content reporting, and soft-delete functionality.

taskComplexityData.title: Performance Optimization and Testing
taskComplexityData.explanation: Very high complexity due to stringent performance requirements, comprehensive testing needs, and the broad scope across the entire application.
